overview: This is the erotic story of a sexy, young starlet's meteoric rise to fame... Sizzling little Julienne Fries makes movie magic. Sparks fly when she falls in lust with veteran porn-star Hugh Jardon, whose own career takes a back seat to Julienne's skyrocketing fame. Meanwhile, sensually dripping beauty Snappie Le Clam is bumping her way to the top by using her uniquely erotic lap muscles to squeeze a lead role out of director Cheech Spielburg. It's a fiery three-way session that also introduces the sexual talents of the sultry redhead Lonnie Lapslitt. The reigning queen-of-porn Traci Le Sorta on an interview show with adult film critic Dick Siskel has a mouthful to say on her career, but Dick just wants to get to the meat of her issues. Pinky Lapels and her pal as well as all the others visit Bunny and Hugh at his annual Hot Tub Jamboree, only to find studio mogul Sid Delorian having a rear-ender with Traci.
tagline: The Erotic Story Of A Starlet's Meteoric Rise To Fame!
title: A Star Is Porn
